title: Nuveen Preferred and Income 2022 Term Fund (JPT) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen Preferred and Income 2022 Term Fund ( JPT  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.119 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased JPT prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 16th quarter that JPT has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $24.63, the dividend yield is 5.8%.
The previous trading day's last sale of JPT was $24.63, representing a -3.22% decrease from the 52 week high of $25.45 and a 21.33% increase over the 52 week low of $20.30.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the JPT Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
